ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: This research was supported by the National Key Technology R&D Program of China (2013BAD03B02 and 2013BAD03B03). We thank all the staff of the Shennongjia National Park for helping us collect the occurrence data of the Sichuan snub‚Äênosed monkey. The authors would like to thank Charlotte Hacker for assistance in editing this paper. This study benefited from inputs of the GDRI EHEDE network ( http://gdri-ehede.univ-fcomte.fr).
